articles.description: A rep for Collins confirmed the news, adding that the 'pain has been excruciating but fortunately she's dealt with it, and she's OK now'
articles.content:
Dame Joan Collins is currently 'recovering and doing fine' after suffering from a pinched nerve in her leg earlier this week.
The 89-year-old star was 'airlifted' to Princess Grace Hospital in Monac… [+3888 chars]

articles.title: Damning investigation by BBC's own journalists claims Tim Westwood abused his position for years - Daily Mail
